food_items.recipe: Chicago-style Polish sausage with grilled onions and mustard.

food_items.name: Vetkoek
food_items.recipe: South African fried dough bread, often stuffed.

food_items.name: Mealie bread
food_items.recipe: South African sweet cornbread.

food_items.name: Chakalaka
food_items.recipe: South African spicy vegetable relish.

food_items.name: Frikkadel
food_items.recipe: South African seasoned meatballs, often in tomato sauce.

food_items.name: /m/07fr1x
food_items.recipe: Unspecified food item.

food_items.name: Tteokguk
food_items.recipe: Korean rice cake soup eaten on New Year's Day.

food_items.name: Coney Island hot dog
food_items.recipe: American hot dog with meat sauce, onions, and mustard.

food_items.name: Tirokafteri
food_items.recipe: Greek spicy cheese dip made with feta and peppers.

food_items.name: Fesikh
food_items.recipe: Egyptian fermented mullet fish, traditional for Sham el-Nessim.

food_items.name: Boston cream pie
food_items.recipe: American cake with custard filling and chocolate glaze.

food_items.name: Buttermilk koldskål
food_items.recipe: Danish cold buttermilk soup with vanilla, often with biscuits.

food_items.name: White boiled shrimp
food_items.recipe: Chinese dish of simply boiled shrimp with dipping sauce.

food_items.name: Bagnun
food_items.recipe: Italian anchovy and onion soup from Liguria.

food_items.name: Buntil
food_items.recipe: Javanese dish of fish wrapped in taro leaves.

food_items.name: /m/07l949
food_items.recipe: Unspecified food item.

food_items.name: Pisto
food_items.recipe: Spanish vegetable stew similar to ratatouille.

food_items.name: Dhokla
food_items.recipe: Indian steamed savory cake made from fermented rice and chickpea batter.

food_items.name: Al pastor
food_items.recipe: Mexican spit-grilled pork with pineapple, derived from shawarma.

food_items.name: St. Paul sandwich
food_items.recipe: St. Louis specialty of an egg foo young patty on white bread with pickles.

food_items.name: Melonpan
food_items.recipe: A Japanese sweet bun with a crisp cookie-like top. Ingredients: flour, sugar, butter, eggs, yeast, milk, and baking powder. Instructions: Prepare a soft bread dough, shape into buns, and top with a cookie dough layer scored in a crisscross pattern. Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 15–20 minutes until golden.

food_items.name: Haupia
food_items.recipe: A Hawaiian coconut milk pudding. Ingredients: coconut milk, sugar, cornstarch, and water. Instructions: Mix ingredients, cook over medium heat until thickened, pour into a pan, and chill until set. Cut into squares to serve.

food_items.name: Lángos
food_items.recipe: A Hungarian fried dough. Ingredients: flour, yeast, milk, sugar, salt, and oil. Instructions: Make a dough, let rise, shape into flat rounds, and fry in hot oil until golden. Serve with garlic, sour cream, or cheese.

food_items.name: Étouffée
food_items.recipe: A Cajun seafood stew. Ingredients: shrimp or crawfish, butter, flour, onions, bell peppers, celery, garlic, tomatoes, and spices. Instructions: Make a roux, cook vegetables, add broth and seafood, simmer, and serve over rice.

food_items.name: Galaktoboureko
food_items.recipe: A Greek custard pie. Ingredients: phyllo pastry, milk, eggs, sugar, semolina, butter, and syrup (sugar, water, lemon). Instructions: Layer phyllo, add custard, top with phyllo, bake at 350°F (175°C) for 45 minutes, and pour syrup over hot pie.

food_items.name: Börek
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 1 package phyllo dough (or yufka)
- 1 lb feta cheese, crumbled
- 1 cup chopped parsley
- 2 eggs
- 1/2 cup milk
- 1/2 cup olive oil
- 1/4 cup butter, melted
- Salt and pepper to taste

Instructions:
1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Mix feta, parsley, 1 egg, salt, and pepper for filling.
3. Combine milk, olive oil, melted butter, and 1 egg for brushing.
4. Layer 2–3 phyllo sheets in a greased baking dish, brushing each with oil mixture.
5. Spread a thin layer of filling, then add another phyllo layer. Repeat until filling is used, ending with phyllo.
6. Brush top with oil mixture, score into squares, and bake for 30–40 minutes until golden.
7. Cool slightly before serving.

Serving Suggestion: Serve warm with tea or yogurt dip.

Note: Calorie count is per serving (1 piece, about 100g).

food_items.name: Suya
food_items.recipe: A Nigerian grilled meat skewer. Ingredients: beef or chicken, peanut powder, cayenne, paprika, onion powder, salt, and oil. Instructions: Marinate meat in spice mix, skewer, and grill over charcoal until cooked. Serve with onions and tomatoes.

food_items.name: Rye bread
food_items.recipe: A dense European bread. Ingredients: rye flour, wheat flour, yeast, water, salt, and molasses. Instructions: Mix dough, let rise, shape into loaves, and bake at 400°F (200°C) for 40–50 minutes.

food_items.name: Escudella i carn d'olla
food_items.recipe: A Catalan stew. Ingredients: pork, chicken, sausage, potatoes, chickpeas, cabbage, and pasta. Instructions: Simmer meats and vegetables in broth, add pasta, and cook until tender. Serve broth first, then meats and vegetables.

food_items.name: Gari
food_items.recipe: A West African cassava flour. Ingredients: cassava roots. Instructions: Peel, grate, ferment, and dry cassava, then grind into flour. Use as a side or in soups.

food_items.name: Tilkut
food_items.recipe: An Indian sesame sweet. Ingredients: sesame seeds, jaggery, and ghee. Instructions: Roast sesame seeds, melt jaggery, mix together, and shape into flat rounds. Cool before serving.

food_items.name: Botok
food_items.recipe: An Indonesian steamed dish. Ingredients: grated coconut, fish or tofu, spices, and banana leaves. Instructions: Mix ingredients, wrap in banana leaves, and steam for 20–30 minutes.

food_items.name: Tatws Pum Munud
food_items.recipe: A Welsh stew. Ingredients: potatoes, bacon, onions, and stock. Instructions: Layer ingredients in a pot, simmer for 1–2 hours, and serve hot.

food_items.name: Char siu
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 2 lbs pork shoulder or loin
- 1/4 cup hoisin sauce
- 1/4 cup honey
- 2 tbsp soy sauce
- 2 tbsp rice wine
- 1 tbsp sesame oil
- 2 tsp five-spice powder
- 3 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 tbsp grated ginger
- Red food coloring (optional)

Instructions:
1. Mix hoisin, honey, soy sauce, rice wine, sesame oil, five-spice, garlic, ginger, and food coloring for marinade.
2. Cut pork into long strips, coat with marinade, and refrigerate for 4–12 hours.
3. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Place pork on a rack over a baking tray with water beneath.
4. Roast for 25–30 minutes, basting with marinade, until caramelized and cooked through.
5. Slice thinly.

Serving Suggestion: Serve with steamed rice or in bao buns with scallions.

Note: Calorie count is per 100g serving.

food_items.name: Burgoo
food_items.recipe: A Kentucky stew. Ingredients: pork, chicken, beef, potatoes, corn, tomatoes, and beans. Instructions: Simmer meats and vegetables in broth for 3–4 hours until thick. Season and serve.

food_items.name: Cacık
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 2 cups plain yogurt
- 1 cucumber, grated
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 2 tbsp chopped fresh dill
- 1 tbsp olive oil
- 1 tsp salt
- 1/4 cup cold water (optional)

Instructions:
1. Grate cucumber and squeeze out excess water.
2. Mix yogurt, cucumber, garlic, dill, olive oil, and salt in a bowl.
3. Add water to adjust consistency if desired.
4. Chill for 30 minutes before serving.

Serving Suggestion: Serve as a dip with pita bread or alongside grilled meats.

Note: Calorie count is per 1/2 cup serving.

food_items.name: Barfi
food_items.recipe: An Indian milk sweet. Ingredients: milk powder, condensed milk, ghee, and nuts. Instructions: Cook ingredients until thick, spread in a tray, top with nuts, and cut into squares after cooling.

food_items.name: Mulligan stew
food_items.recipe: An Indian milk sweet. Ingredients: milk powder, condensed milk, ghee, and nuts. Instructions: Cook ingredients until thick, spread in a tray, top with nuts, and cut into squares after cooling.

food_items.name: Biangbiang noodles
food_items.recipe: A Chinese wide noodle dish. Ingredients: flour, water, chili oil, garlic, soy sauce, and scallions. Instructions: Make dough, roll into wide noodles, boil, and toss with spicy sauce.

food_items.name: Banana pudding
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 3/4 cup sugar
- 1/3 cup flour
- 1/4 tsp salt
- 2 cups milk
- 3 egg yolks, beaten
- 2 tbsp butter
- 1 tsp vanilla extract
- 3–4 ripe bananas, sliced
- 1 box vanilla wafers (about 50)
- 1 cup whipped cream (optional)

Instructions:
1. In a saucepan, mix sugar, flour, and salt. Gradually whisk in milk.
2. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until thickened (about 10 minutes).
3. Temper egg yolks with hot mixture, then add back to saucepan. Cook 2 minutes more.
4. Remove from heat, stir in butter and vanilla.
5. In a dish, layer wafers, bananas, and custard. Repeat layers.
6. Chill for 4 hours. Top with whipped cream if desired.

Serving Suggestion: Serve cold as a dessert.

Note: Calorie count is per 1 cup serving.

food_items.name: Crab cake
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 1 lb lump crabmeat
- 1/4 cup mayonnaise
- 1 egg, beaten
- 1 tbsp Dijon mustard
- 1 tbsp Worcestershire sauce
- 1 tsp Old Bay seasoning
- 1/4 cup breadcrumbs
- 2 tbsp chopped parsley
- Oil for frying

Instructions:
1. Gently mix crabmeat, mayonnaise, egg, mustard, Worcestershire, Old Bay, breadcrumbs, and parsley.
2. Shape into patties (about 8).
3. Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Fry patties 3–4 minutes per side until golden.
4. Drain on paper towels.

Serving Suggestion: Serve with tartar sauce or lemon wedges.

Note: Calorie count is per cake.

food_items.name: Chinese sausage
food_items.recipe: A cured pork sausage. Ingredients: pork, soy sauce, sugar, rice wine, and spices. Instructions: Mix ingredients, stuff into casings, and air-dry for 1–2 weeks. Slice and stir-fry or steam.

food_items.name: Veal
food_items.recipe: Young beef meat. Ingredients: veal cutlets, salt, pepper, flour, and butter. Instructions: Season and dredge veal in flour, pan-fry in butter for 3–4 minutes per side until golden.

food_items.name: Curry bread
food_items.recipe: A Japanese bread roll. Ingredients: bread dough, curry filling (beef, onions, carrots), and breadcrumbs. Instructions: Wrap curry in dough, coat with breadcrumbs, and deep-fry until golden.

food_items.name: Pastry heart
food_items.recipe: A Danish puff pastry. Ingredients: puff pastry, jam, and icing. Instructions: Cut pastry into hearts, add jam, bake at 400°F (200°C) for 15–20 minutes, and drizzle with icing.

food_items.name: Crème caramel
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 1 cup sugar (for caramel)
- 1/4 cup water
- 2 cups milk
- 1/2 cup sugar (for custard)
- 3 eggs
- 1 tsp vanilla extract

Instructions:
1. Preheat oven to 325°F (160°C).
2. Heat 1 cup sugar and water in a saucepan until it forms a golden caramel. Pour into ramekins.
3. Warm milk. Whisk eggs, 1/2 cup sugar, and vanilla. Gradually add milk.
4. Pour custard into ramekins. Place in a water bath and bake for 40–50 minutes until set.
5. Chill for 4 hours, then invert to serve.

Serving Suggestion: Serve chilled with caramel sauce.

Note: Calorie count is per ramekin.

food_items.name: Panada
food_items.recipe: An Italian stuffed bread. Ingredients: bread dough, meat or vegetable filling, and spices. Instructions: Fill dough with mixture, seal, and bake at 375°F (190°C) for 30–40 minutes.

food_items.name: Pie à la Mode
food_items.recipe: Any pie with ice cream. Ingredients: pie (e.g., apple or cherry), vanilla ice cream. Instructions: Bake pie, slice, and top with a scoop of ice cream.

food_items.name: Bonus Jack
food_items.recipe: A fast-food burger. Ingredients: beef patty, bun, lettuce, tomato, onions, pickles, ketchup, mayo, and cheese. Instructions: Grill patty, assemble with toppings, and serve.

food_items.name: Princess cake
food_items.recipe: A Swedish layered cake. Ingredients: sponge cake, custard, whipped cream, marzipan, and jam. Instructions: Layer cake with fillings, cover with marzipan, and decorate.

food_items.name: Harihari-nabe
food_items.recipe: A Japanese hot pot. Ingredients: whale or pork, mizuna greens, tofu, and dashi broth. Instructions: Simmer ingredients in broth and serve hot.

food_items.name: Hot chicken
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 4 chicken thighs or breasts
- 1 cup buttermilk
- 2 cups flour
- 1 tbsp cayenne pepper
- 1 tbsp paprika
- 1 tsp garlic powder
- 1 tsp salt
- Oil for frying
- 1/4 cup hot sauce
- 2 tbsp melted butter

Instructions:
1. Marinate chicken in buttermilk for 4–8 hours.
2. Mix flour, cayenne, paprika, garlic powder, and salt.
3. Dredge chicken in flour mixture.
4. Heat oil to 350°F (175°C) and fry chicken for 10–12 minutes until golden.
5. Mix hot sauce and butter, brush over chicken.

Serving Suggestion: Serve with pickles and white bread.

Note: Calorie count is per piece.

food_items.name: Chhena Jhili
food_items.recipe: An Indian sweet. Ingredients: chhena (paneer), sugar, flour, and ghee. Instructions: Form chhena into balls, fry in ghee, and soak in sugar syrup.

food_items.name: Grape pie
food_items.recipe: An American fruit pie. Ingredients: pie crust, grapes, sugar, cornstarch, and lemon juice. Instructions: Mix grapes with sugar and cornstarch, fill crust, and bake at 375°F (190°C) for 40–50 minutes.

food_items.name: Chicken bog
food_items.recipe: A Southern rice dish. Ingredients: chicken, rice, sausage, onions, and spices. Instructions: Cook chicken and sausage, add rice and broth, and simmer until rice is tender.

food_items.name: Sausage gravy
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 1 lb breakfast sausage
- 1/4 cup flour
- 2 cups milk
- Salt and pepper to taste

Instructions:
1. Cook sausage in a skillet, breaking it apart, until browned.
2. Stir in flour and cook for 1–2 minutes.
3. Gradually add milk, stirring until thickened.
4. Season with salt and pepper.

Serving Suggestion: Serve over biscuits.

Note: Calorie count is per 1/2 cup serving.

food_items.name: Derby pie
food_items.recipe: A Kentucky chocolate-nut pie. Ingredients: pie crust, pecans, chocolate chips, eggs, sugar, and bourbon. Instructions: Mix filling, pour into crust, and bake at 350°F (175°C) for 40–45 minutes.

food_items.name: Ice cream cake
food_items.recipe: A layered dessert. Ingredients: cake (chocolate or vanilla), ice cream, and whipped cream. Instructions: Layer softened ice cream over cake, freeze, and top with whipped cream.

food_items.name: Swiss steak
food_items.recipe: A braised beef dish. Ingredients: round steak, flour, onions, tomatoes, and broth. Instructions: Pound steak, dredge in flour, brown, and simmer with vegetables for 1–2 hours.

food_items.name: /m/083tx9
food_items.recipe: Unknown dish. No recipe available.

food_items.name: Stack cake
food_items.recipe: An Appalachian layered cake. Ingredients: molasses cake layers, applesauce, and sugar. Instructions: Bake thin cake layers, stack with applesauce, and let sit for 24 hours.

food_items.name: Lobster Newberg
food_items.recipe: A creamy lobster dish. Ingredients: lobster, butter, cream, egg yolks, sherry, and cayenne. Instructions: Cook lobster, make a cream sauce, add lobster, and serve over toast.

food_items.name: Nikujaga
food_items.recipe: A Japanese beef stew. Ingredients: beef, potatoes, carrots, onions, soy sauce, and mirin. Instructions: Simmer ingredients in a seasoned broth until tender.

food_items.name: Manti
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 2 cups flour
- 1 egg
- 1/2 cup water
- 1/2 lb ground lamb or beef
- 1 onion, finely chopped
- 1 tsp salt
- 1/2 tsp black pepper
- 1 cup yogurt
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 2 tbsp butter
- 1 tsp paprika

Instructions:
1. Mix flour, egg, and water to form a dough. Knead and rest for 30 minutes.
2. Mix meat, onion, salt, and pepper for filling.
3. Roll dough thin, cut into squares, add filling, and seal into dumplings.
4. Boil dumplings for 10–12 minutes.
5. Mix yogurt and garlic for sauce.
6. Melt butter with paprika.
7. Serve dumplings with yogurt and butter sauce.

Serving Suggestion: Sprinkle with dried mint.

Note: Calorie count is per serving (about 10 dumplings).

food_items.name: Parmigiana
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 2 eggplants, sliced
- 2 cups breadcrumbs
- 1/2 cup flour
- 2 eggs, beaten
- 2 cups marinara sauce
- 2 cups mozzarella, shredded
- 1/2 cup Parmesan, grated
- Oil for frying
- Fresh basil

Instructions:
1. Salt eggplant slices and let sit for 30 minutes to remove moisture. Pat dry.
2. Dredge in flour, dip in egg, and coat with breadcrumbs.
3. Fry slices in hot oil until golden, then drain.
4. In a baking dish, layer sauce, eggplant, mozzarella, and Parmesan.
5. Bake at 375°F (190°C) for 25–30 minutes until bubbly.
6. Garnish with basil.

Serving Suggestion: Serve with pasta or crusty bread.

Note: Calorie count is per serving (about 1/4 of dish).

food_items.name: Palatschinke
food_items.recipe: A thin pancake. Ingredients: flour, eggs, milk, and sugar. Instructions: Mix batter, pour thinly into a hot pan, cook until golden on both sides, and fill with jam or cheese.

food_items.name: Gujeolpan
food_items.recipe: A Korean platter. Ingredients: pancakes, beef, vegetables, and mushrooms. Instructions: Prepare small pancakes, stir-fry ingredients, and serve for wrapping.

food_items.name: Rajas con crema
food_items.recipe: A Mexican dish. Ingredients: poblano peppers, cream, onions, and cheese. Instructions: Roast and slice peppers, sauté with onions, add cream, and top with cheese.

food_items.name: Mak-guksu
food_items.recipe: A Korean buckwheat noodle dish. Ingredients: buckwheat noodles, broth, cucumber, and chili sauce. Instructions: Boil noodles, chill, and serve with toppings and broth.

food_items.name: Tetrazzini
food_items.recipe: A creamy pasta casserole. Ingredients: chicken or turkey, spaghetti, mushrooms, cream, and Parmesan. Instructions: Cook pasta, mix with sauce and meat, top with cheese, and bake.

food_items.name: Squid
food_items.recipe: Seafood dish. Ingredients: squid, flour, salt, and oil. Instructions: Clean and slice squid, dredge in flour, and fry or grill until tender.

food_items.name: Palak paneer
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 1 lb spinach, washed
- 1 cup paneer, cubed
- 1 onion, chopped
- 2 tomatoes, pureed
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 tsp ginger, grated
- 1 tsp cumin seeds
- 1 tsp garam masala
- 1/2 tsp turmeric
- 1/2 tsp chili powder
- 1/4 cup cream
- Oil and salt

Instructions:
1. Blanch spinach and blend into a puree.
2. Heat oil, add cumin seeds, then sauté onion, garlic, and ginger until golden.
3. Add tomato puree, turmeric, chili powder, and garam masala. Cook for 5 minutes.
4. Add spinach puree and salt, simmer for 5 minutes.
5. Add paneer and cream, cook for 2–3 minutes.

Serving Suggestion: Serve with naan or rice.

Note: Calorie count is per 1 cup serving.

food_items.name: Krumkake
food_items.recipe: A Norwegian wafer cookie. Ingredients: flour, eggs, sugar, butter, and cardamom. Instructions: Make batter, cook in a krumkake iron, and roll into cones.

food_items.name: Bolani
food_items.recipe: An Afghan flatbread. Ingredients: flour, potatoes, leeks, and spices. Instructions: Make dough, fill with potato mixture, and fry until golden.

food_items.name: Pork and beans
food_items.recipe: A baked dish. Ingredients: navy beans, pork, molasses, and tomato sauce. Instructions: Simmer beans with pork and sauce, then bake until thick.

food_items.name: Nian gao
food_items.recipe: A Chinese sticky rice cake. Ingredients: glutinous rice flour, sugar, and water. Instructions: Mix ingredients, steam for 1–2 hours, and slice to serve.

food_items.name: Oysters Rockefeller
food_items.recipe: A baked oyster dish. Ingredients: oysters, spinach, butter, breadcrumbs, and Pernod. Instructions: Top oysters with mixture, bake at 450°F (230°C) for 10 minutes.

food_items.name: Tavče gravče
food_items.recipe: A Macedonian bean dish. Ingredients: white beans, onions, peppers, and paprika. Instructions: Cook beans, sauté vegetables, mix, and bake until crusty.

food_items.name: Bakkwa
food_items.recipe: A Chinese dried meat. Ingredients: pork, soy sauce, sugar, and honey. Instructions: Marinate meat, air-dry, and grill until caramelized.

food_items.name: Xacuti
food_items.recipe: A Goan curry. Ingredients: chicken, coconut, spices, and tamarind. Instructions: Roast spices, blend with coconut, cook with chicken, and simmer.

food_items.name: Sarapatel
food_items.recipe: A Goan pork stew. Ingredients: pork, liver, vinegar, and spices. Instructions: Cook pork with spices, simmer in vinegar-based sauce, and serve.

food_items.name: Taquito
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 12 corn tortillas
- 1 lb shredded chicken or beef
- 1/2 cup onion, chopped
- 1 tsp cumin
- 1 tsp chili powder
- Oil for frying
- Salt to taste

Instructions:
1. Cook meat with onion, cumin, chili powder, and salt.
2. Warm tortillas to make pliable.
3. Place 2 tbsp filling in each tortilla, roll tightly.
4. Heat oil to 350°F (175°C) and fry taquitos until crispy, about 2–3 minutes.
5. Drain on paper towels.

Serving Suggestion: Serve with guacamole, salsa, or sour cream.

Note: Calorie count is per 2 taquitos.

food_items.name: Egg drop soup
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 4 cups chicken broth
- 2 eggs, beaten
- 1 tbsp cornstarch
- 2 tbsp water
- 1 tsp soy sauce
- 1/4 tsp white pepper
- 2 scallions, chopped

Instructions:
1. Bring broth to a boil.
2. Mix cornstarch and water, stir into broth to thicken.
3. Slowly pour in eggs while stirring to create ribbons.
4. Add soy sauce, pepper, and scallions.

Serving Suggestion: Serve hot as an appetizer.

Note: Calorie count is per 1 cup serving.

food_items.name: Shaobing
food_items.recipe: A Chinese layered flatbread. Ingredients: flour, sesame seeds, oil, and salt. Instructions: Layer dough with oil, roll, sprinkle with sesame, and bake or fry.

food_items.name: Chawanmushi
food_items.recipe: A Japanese egg custard. Ingredients: eggs, dashi, soy sauce, and shrimp. Instructions: Mix ingredients, pour into cups, and steam for 10–15 minutes.

food_items.name: Nshima/Nsima
food_items.recipe: A Southern African staple. Ingredients: cornmeal and water. Instructions: Boil water, add cornmeal, and stir until thick. Serve with stew.

food_items.name: Pollock roe
food_items.recipe: A Korean delicacy. Ingredients: pollock roe, salt, and chili. Instructions: Salt roe, marinate with chili, and serve raw or grilled.

food_items.name: Slinger
food_items.recipe: A Midwest diner dish. Ingredients: eggs, hashbrowns, hamburger patty, chili, and cheese. Instructions: Layer ingredients, top with chili and cheese, and serve.

food_items.name: Japchae
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 8 oz sweet potato noodles
- 1/2 lb beef, sliced
- 1 carrot, julienned
- 1 onion, sliced
- 1 cup spinach
- 2 tbsp soy sauce
- 1 tbsp sesame oil
- 1 tbsp sugar
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- Sesame seeds

Instructions:
1. Cook noodles, rinse, and drain.
2. Stir-fry beef with garlic, then remove.
3. Stir-fry carrot, onion, and spinach separately.
4. Mix noodles, beef, vegetables, soy sauce, sesame oil, and sugar.
5. Garnish with sesame seeds.

Serving Suggestion: Serve warm or cold.

Note: Calorie count is per 1 cup serving.

food_items.name: St. Honoré cake
food_items.recipe: A French pastry. Ingredients: puff pastry, choux pastry, custard, and caramel. Instructions: Bake pastry base, top with cream-filled choux, and drizzle with caramel.

food_items.name: Barm cake
food_items.recipe: A British bread roll. Ingredients: flour, yeast, water, and salt. Instructions: Make dough, shape into rolls, and bake at 425°F (220°C) for 15–20 minutes.

food_items.name: Tulumba
food_items.recipe: A Turkish fried pastry. Ingredients: flour, eggs, butter, and syrup. Instructions: Pipe dough into hot oil, fry until golden, and soak in syrup.

food_items.name: Xiaolongbao
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 2 cups flour
- 1/2 cup hot water
- 1/2 lb ground pork
- 1 tbsp soy sauce
- 1 tbsp sesame oil
- 1 tsp ginger, minced
- 1/4 cup chicken broth
- 2 scallions, chopped

Instructions:
1. Mix flour and water to form dough, rest for 30 minutes.
2. Mix pork, soy sauce, sesame oil, ginger, scallions, and broth for filling.
3. Roll dough into thin circles, add filling, and pleat to seal.
4. Steam for 8–10 minutes.

Serving Suggestion: Serve with soy-vinegar dip.

Note: Calorie count is per 4 dumplings.

food_items.name: Delmonico steak
food_items.recipe: A grilled steak. Ingredients: ribeye or sirloin, salt, pepper, and butter. Instructions: Season steak, grill to desired doneness, and top with butter.

food_items.name: Stromboli
food_items.recipe: An Italian-American roll. Ingredients: pizza dough, salami, cheese, and peppers. Instructions: Roll dough with fillings, seal, and bake at 400°F (200°C) for 20–25 minutes.

food_items.name: Kanafeh
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 1 lb shredded phyllo (kataifi)
- 1 cup unsalted butter, melted
- 2 cups mozzarella or akkawi cheese
- 1/2 cup pistachios, chopped
- 2 cups sugar
- 1 cup water
- 1 tsp lemon juice
- 1 tsp rose water

Instructions:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Mix phyllo with butter, press half into a baking dish.
3. Add cheese layer, then top with remaining phyllo.
4. Bake for 40–50 minutes until golden.
5. Boil sugar, water, and lemon juice for syrup, add rose water, and pour over hot kanafeh.
6. Sprinkle with pistachios.

Serving Suggestion: Serve warm.

Note: Calorie count is per 100g serving.

food_items.name: Hamdog
food_items.recipe: A burger-hot dog hybrid. Ingredients: beef patty, hot dog, bun, bacon, cheese, and fries. Instructions: Grill patty and hot dog, assemble with toppings, and serve.

food_items.name: Garri
food_items.recipe: A West African cassava flour. Ingredients: cassava roots. Instructions: Peel, grate, ferment, and dry cassava, then grind into flour. Use as a side or in soups.

food_items.name: Kofta
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 1 lb ground lamb or beef
- 1 onion, grated
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 1/4 cup parsley, chopped
- 1 tsp cumin
- 1 tsp coriander
- 1/2 tsp cinnamon
- Salt and pepper
- Oil for grilling

Instructions:
1. Mix meat, onion, garlic, parsley, spices, salt, and pepper.
2. Shape into skewers or patties.
3. Grill over medium heat for 8–10 minutes, turning occasionally.

Serving Suggestion: Serve with pita, yogurt sauce, and salad.

Note: Calorie count is per 2 koftas.

food_items.name: Chana masala
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 2 cups cooked chickpeas
- 1 onion, chopped
- 2 tomatoes, pureed
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 tsp ginger, grated
- 1 tsp cumin seeds
- 1 tsp garam masala
- 1/2 tsp turmeric
- 1 tsp chili powder
- 2 tbsp oil
- Salt to taste

Instructions:
1. Heat oil, add cumin seeds, then sauté onion, garlic, and ginger.
2. Add tomato puree, turmeric, chili powder, and garam masala. Cook for 5 minutes.
3. Add chickpeas and 1/2 cup water, simmer for 10 minutes.
4. Season with salt.

Serving Suggestion: Serve with rice or naan.

Note: Calorie count is per 1 cup serving.

food_items.name: Salo
food_items.recipe: A Slavic cured pork fat. Ingredients: pork fat, salt, and garlic. Instructions: Cure fat with salt and garlic for 1–2 weeks, slice thinly, and serve.

food_items.name: Lung fung soup
food_items.recipe: A Chinese soup. Ingredients: chicken, shrimp, mushrooms, and broth. Instructions: Simmer ingredients in broth, season, and serve hot.

food_items.name: Dirty rice
food_items.recipe: A Cajun rice dish. Ingredients: rice, chicken liver, bell peppers, onions, and spices. Instructions: Cook rice, sauté liver and vegetables, mix, and season.

food_items.name: Urnebes
food_items.recipe: A Serbian cheese spread. Ingredients: feta, chili peppers, garlic, and oil. Instructions: Blend ingredients into a spread and serve with bread.

food_items.name: Andouillette
food_items.recipe: A French sausage. Ingredients: pork intestines, onions, and spices. Instructions: Grill or pan-fry sausage and serve with mustard.

food_items.name: Landjäger
food_items.recipe: A Swiss-German dried sausage. Ingredients: beef, pork, wine, and spices. Instructions: Mix ingredients, stuff into casings, and air-dry for weeks.

food_items.name: Fisherman's soup
food_items.recipe: A Hungarian fish soup. Ingredients: carp, paprika, onions, and peppers. Instructions: Simmer fish with vegetables and spices for 1–2 hours.

food_items.name: Romeritos
food_items.recipe: A Mexican vegetable dish. Ingredients: romeritos, mole sauce, potatoes, and shrimp. Instructions: Cook vegetables, mix with mole, and serve.

food_items.name: Lane cake
food_items.recipe: A Southern layered cake. Ingredients: white cake, pecans, raisins, and bourbon frosting. Instructions: Bake cake layers, fill with fruit-nut mixture, and frost.

food_items.name: Pork jelly
food_items.recipe: A Slavic aspic. Ingredients: pork, gelatin, garlic, and broth. Instructions: Simmer pork, add gelatin to broth, pour into molds, and chill.

food_items.name: Idiyappam
food_items.recipe: An Indian rice noodle. Ingredients: rice flour and water. Instructions: Make dough, extrude into noodles, and steam. Serve with curry.

food_items.name: Smörgåstårta
food_items.recipe: A Swedish sandwich cake. Ingredients: bread, cream cheese, seafood, and vegetables. Instructions: Layer bread with fillings, frost with cream cheese, and decorate.

food_items.name: Smažený sýr
food_items.recipe: A Czech fried cheese. Ingredients: Edam cheese, flour, egg, and breadcrumbs. Instructions: Coat cheese, fry until golden, and serve with tartar sauce.

food_items.name: Arroz con pollo
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 1 lb chicken thighs
- 1 cup rice
- 1 onion, chopped
- 1 bell pepper, chopped
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 cup tomato sauce
- 2 cups chicken broth
- 1 tsp cumin
- 1 tsp paprika
- Oil and salt

Instructions:
1. Season chicken with salt and brown in oil. Remove.
2. Sauté onion, pepper, and garlic.
3. Add rice, cumin, and paprika, stir for 1 minute.
4. Add tomato sauce and broth, return chicken, and simmer for 20–25 minutes until rice is cooked.

Serving Suggestion: Serve with peas or olives.

Note: Calorie count is per 1 cup serving.

food_items.name: /m/08xmsn
food_items.recipe: Unknown dish. No recipe available.

food_items.name: Petit gâteau
food_items.recipe: A Brazilian chocolate cake. Ingredients: chocolate, butter, eggs, and sugar. Instructions: Melt chocolate and butter, mix with eggs and sugar, bake in ramekins for 8–10 minutes.

food_items.name: Tea egg
food_items.recipe: A Chinese snack. Ingredients: eggs, soy sauce, tea, and spices. Instructions: Boil eggs, crack shells, and simmer in seasoned broth for 1–2 hours.

food_items.name: Cocada amarela
food_items.recipe: A Brazilian coconut dessert. Ingredients: coconut, sugar, egg yolks, and milk. Instructions: Cook ingredients until thick, cool, and serve.

food_items.name: Japanese curry
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 1 lb chicken or beef, cubed
- 1 onion, sliced
- 2 carrots, chopped
- 2 potatoes, cubed
- 2 tbsp curry roux
- 2 cups water
- Oil and salt

Instructions:
1. Sauté onion in oil until soft.
2. Add meat and brown.
3. Add carrots, potatoes, and water. Simmer for 15 minutes.
4. Stir in curry roux until dissolved, cook for 5 minutes.

Serving Suggestion: Serve over rice.

Note: Calorie count is per 1 cup serving.

food_items.name: Qeema
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 1 lb ground beef or lamb
- 1 onion, chopped
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 tsp ginger, grated
- 2 tomatoes, chopped
- 1 tsp cumin
- 1 tsp coriander
- 1/2 tsp turmeric
- 1 tsp chili powder
- Oil and salt

Instructions:
1. Heat oil, sauté onion, garlic, and ginger.
2. Add meat and brown.
3. Add tomatoes and spices, cook for 10–15 minutes until thick.

Serving Suggestion: Serve with naan or rice.

Note: Calorie count is per 1 cup serving.

food_items.name: Unagi
food_items.recipe: A Japanese grilled eel. Ingredients: eel, soy sauce, mirin, and sugar. Instructions: Grill eel, baste with sauce, and serve over rice.

food_items.name: Hoppin' John
food_items.recipe: A Southern rice dish. Ingredients: black-eyed peas, rice, bacon, and onions. Instructions: Cook peas, sauté bacon and onions, mix with rice, and simmer.

food_items.name: Gyūhi
food_items.recipe: A Japanese mochi. Ingredients: glutinous rice flour, sugar, and water. Instructions: Cook ingredients into a soft dough, shape, and dust with starch.

food_items.name: Clafoutis
food_items.recipe: A French dessert. Ingredients: cherries, eggs, flour, milk, and sugar. Instructions: Pour batter over cherries and bake at 350°F (175°C) for 35–40 minutes.

food_items.name: Green curry
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 1 lb chicken, sliced
- 1 can coconut milk
- 2 tbsp green curry paste
- 1 cup eggplant, cubed
- 1/2 cup bamboo shoots
- 2 tbsp fish sauce
- 1 tbsp sugar
- Basil leaves

Instructions:
1. Heat 1/4 cup coconut milk, add curry paste, and stir.
2. Add chicken and cook until browned.
3. Add remaining coconut milk, eggplant, bamboo shoots, fish sauce, and sugar. Simmer for 10 minutes.
4. Garnish with basil.

Serving Suggestion: Serve with jasmine rice.

Note: Calorie count is per 1 cup serving.

food_items.name: Gỏi cuốn
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 8 rice paper wrappers
- 1/2 lb shrimp, cooked
- 1 cup rice noodles, cooked
- 1 cup lettuce, shredded
- 1/2 cup carrots, julienned
- Fresh herbs (mint, cilantro)
- Peanut sauce for dipping

Instructions:
1. Soak rice paper in warm water until soft.
2. Place shrimp, noodles, lettuce, carrots, and herbs in center.
3. Fold sides and roll tightly.

Serving Suggestion: Serve with peanut sauce.

Note: Calorie count is per 2 rolls.

food_items.name: Chilli crab
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 2 lbs crab, cleaned
- 1/4 cup tomato sauce
- 2 tbsp chili sauce
- 1 tbsp soy sauce
- 1 tbsp sugar
- 1 onion, chopped
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 tsp ginger, grated
- Oil and scallions

Instructions:
1. Sauté onion, garlic, and ginger in oil.
2. Add tomato sauce, chili sauce, soy sauce, and sugar.
3. Add crab, cover, and cook for 10–15 minutes.
4. Garnish with scallions.

Serving Suggestion: Serve with mantou buns.

Note: Calorie count is per 1 cup serving.

food_items.name: Lo mai gai
food_items.recipe: A Chinese sticky rice dish. Ingredients: glutinous rice, chicken, mushrooms, and lotus leaves. Instructions: Soak rice, fill leaves with ingredients, and steam for 1 hour.

food_items.name: Lo mein
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 8 oz lo mein noodles
- 1/2 lb chicken or beef, sliced
- 1 cup broccoli
- 1 carrot, sliced
- 2 tbsp soy sauce
- 1 tbsp oyster sauce
- 1 tsp sesame oil
- Oil and garlic

Instructions:
1. Cook noodles, drain.
2. Stir-fry meat with garlic, add vegetables.
3. Add noodles, soy sauce, oyster sauce, and sesame oil. Toss.

Serving Suggestion: Serve hot.

Note: Calorie count is per 1 cup serving.

food_items.name: Puttu
food_items.recipe: An Indian steamed rice cake. Ingredients: rice flour, coconut, and water. Instructions: Mix ingredients, steam in a cylindrical mold, and serve with curry.

food_items.name: Fried pie
food_items.recipe: A Southern dessert. Ingredients: pie dough, fruit filling (e.g., apple), and oil. Instructions: Fill dough, seal, and fry until golden.

food_items.name: Spanish rice
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 1 cup rice
- 1/2 cup tomato sauce
- 1 onion, chopped
- 1 bell pepper, chopped
- 2 cups chicken broth
- 1 tsp cumin
- Oil and salt

Instructions:
1. Sauté onion and pepper in oil.
2. Add rice and cumin, stir for 1 minute.
3. Add tomato sauce and broth, simmer for 20 minutes.

Serving Suggestion: Serve as a side.

Note: Calorie count is per 1 cup serving.

food_items.name: Nuea phat phrik
food_items.recipe: A Thai stir-fry. Ingredients: beef, chili peppers, garlic, fish sauce, and basil. Instructions: Stir-fry ingredients quickly and serve with rice.

food_items.name: Jeow bong
food_items.recipe: A Laotian chili paste. Ingredients: chilies, galangal, garlic, and fish sauce. Instructions: Roast ingredients, blend, and serve as a dip.

food_items.name: Massaman curry
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 1 lb chicken or beef
- 1 can coconut milk
- 2 tbsp massaman curry paste
- 1 cup potatoes, cubed
- 1/2 cup peanuts
- 2 tbsp fish sauce
- 1 tbsp tamarind paste
- 1 tbsp sugar

Instructions:
1. Heat 1/4 cup coconut milk, add curry paste, and stir.
2. Add meat and cook until browned.
3. Add remaining coconut milk, potatoes, peanuts, fish sauce, tamarind, and sugar. Simmer for 20 minutes.

Serving Suggestion: Serve with rice.

Note: Calorie count is per 1 cup serving.

food_items.name: Ostkaka
food_items.recipe: A Swedish cheesecake. Ingredients: milk, rennet, flour, eggs, and sugar. Instructions: Curdle milk, mix with ingredients, and bake at 350°F (175°C) for 1 hour.

food_items.name: Guilinggao
food_items.recipe: A Chinese herbal jelly. Ingredients: turtle shell, herbs, and sugar. Instructions: Boil ingredients, strain, and chill until set.

food_items.name: Spettekaka
food_items.recipe: A Swedish spit cake. Ingredients: eggs, sugar, and potato starch. Instructions: Pipe batter onto a rotating spit and bake until crisp.

food_items.name: Cudighi
food_items.recipe: An Italian-American sausage. Ingredients: pork, spices, and wine. Instructions: Mix ingredients, stuff into casings, and grill or fry.

food_items.name: Saltimbocca
food_items.recipe: An Italian veal dish. Ingredients: veal, prosciutto, sage, and wine. Instructions: Wrap veal with prosciutto and sage, pan-fry, and deglaze with wine.

food_items.name: Sfogliatella
food_items.recipe: An Italian pastry. Ingredients: puff pastry, ricotta, semolina, and citrus. Instructions: Fill pastry, shape into shells, and bake at 400°F (200°C) for 20–25 minutes.

food_items.name: Beef chow fun
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 8 oz wide rice noodles
- 1/2 lb beef, sliced
- 1 onion, sliced
- 1 cup bean sprouts
- 2 tbsp soy sauce
- 1 tbsp oyster sauce
- Oil and scallions

Instructions:
1. Soak noodles until soft, drain.
2. Stir-fry beef with onion, remove.
3. Stir-fry noodles with soy sauce and oyster sauce.
4. Add beef, onion, bean sprouts, and scallions. Toss.

Serving Suggestion: Serve hot.

Note: Calorie count is per 1 cup serving.

food_items.name: Chow mein sandwich
food_items.recipe: A New England dish. Ingredients: chow mein noodles, chicken, gravy, and bun. Instructions: Cook chow mein, place in bun with gravy, and serve.

food_items.name: Carnitas
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 2 lbs pork shoulder
- 1 onion, chopped
- 4 cloves garlic
- 1 tbsp cumin
- 1 tbsp oregano
- 1 cup orange juice
- Salt and pepper
- Oil

Instructions:
1. Season pork with cumin, oregano, salt, and pepper.
2. Sear pork in oil, then add onion, garlic, and orange juice.
3. Simmer for 2–3 hours until tender.
4. Shred pork and crisp in a skillet.

Serving Suggestion: Serve in tacos with cilantro and onion.

Note: Calorie count is per 1/2 cup serving.

food_items.name: Chinese steamed eggs
food_items.recipe: A silky egg dish. Ingredients: eggs, water, and salt. Instructions: Whisk eggs with water, steam for 10–12 minutes, and garnish with soy sauce.

food_items.name: Oyster omelette
food_items.recipe: A Taiwanese dish. Ingredients: oysters, eggs, sweet potato starch, and scallions. Instructions: Mix batter, fry with oysters and eggs, and serve with sauce.

food_items.name: Garden salad
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 2 cups lettuce
- 1/2 cup cucumber, sliced
- 1/2 cup cherry tomatoes, halved
- 1/4 cup red onion, sliced
- 2 tbsp olive oil
- 1 tbsp balsamic vinegar
- Salt and pepper

Instructions:
1. Toss vegetables in a bowl.
2. Drizzle with oil and vinegar, season with salt and pepper.

Serving Suggestion: Serve as a side.

Note: Calorie count is per 1 cup serving.

food_items.name: Salade niçoise
food_items.recipe: A French salad. Ingredients: tuna, green beans, potatoes, eggs, olives, and vinaigrette. Instructions: Arrange ingredients, drizzle with dressing, and serve.

food_items.name: Dal bhat
food_items.recipe: A Nepali lentil and rice dish. Ingredients: lentils, rice, spices, and vegetables. Instructions: Cook lentils with spices, serve with boiled rice and sides.

food_items.name: Biscuits and gravy
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 2 cups flour
- 1 tbsp baking powder
- 1/2 tsp salt
- 1/2 cup butter
- 3/4 cup milk
- 1 lb sausage
- 1/4 cup flour
- 2 cups milk

Instructions:
1. Mix flour, baking powder, and salt. Cut in butter, add milk, and knead dough.
2. Roll out, cut biscuits, and bake at 425°F (220°C) for 12–15 minutes.
3. Cook sausage, stir in flour, and add milk to make gravy.
4. Serve gravy over biscuits.

Serving Suggestion: Serve hot.

Note: Calorie count is per serving (2 biscuits with gravy).

food_items.name: Omurice
food_items.recipe: A Japanese omelette rice. Ingredients: rice, chicken, ketchup, eggs, and onions. Instructions: Stir-fry rice with fillings, wrap in a thin omelette, and top with ketchup.

food_items.name: Pao cai
food_items.recipe: A Chinese pickled vegetable. Ingredients: cabbage, salt, chili, and Sichuan pepper. Instructions: Ferment vegetables with spices for 3–5 days.

food_items.name: Nasi liwet
food_items.recipe: An Indonesian rice dish. Ingredients: rice, coconut milk, chicken, and spices. Instructions: Cook rice with ingredients in a pot until fragrant.

food_items.name: Thai suki
food_items.recipe: A Thai hot pot. Ingredients: beef, seafood, vegetables, noodles, and spicy sauce. Instructions: Simmer ingredients in broth and dip in sauce.

food_items.name: Moo shu pork
food_items.recipe: A Chinese stir-fry. Ingredients: pork, cabbage, mushrooms, eggs, and pancakes. Instructions: Stir-fry ingredients, serve with pancakes and hoisin sauce.

food_items.name: Corn crab soup
food_items.recipe: A Chinese soup. Ingredients: crabmeat, corn, eggs, and broth. Instructions: Simmer ingredients, add egg ribbons, and season.

food_items.name: Fabes con almejas
food_items.recipe: A Spanish bean stew. Ingredients: white beans, clams, onions, and garlic. Instructions: Cook beans, add clams and seasonings, and simmer.

food_items.name: Golden Opulence Sundae
food_items.recipe: A luxury dessert. Ingredients: ice cream, gold leaf, caviar, and exotic fruits. Instructions: Layer ingredients in a goblet and serve.

food_items.name: Ketoprak
food_items.recipe: An Indonesian street food. Ingredients: tofu, rice noodles, bean sprouts, and peanut sauce. Instructions: Fry tofu, mix with ingredients, and top with sauce.

food_items.name: Mala Mogodu
food_items.recipe: A South African tripe stew. Ingredients: tripe, onions, tomatoes, and spices. Instructions: Simmer tripe with vegetables for 2–3 hours.

food_items.name: Tekwan
food_items.recipe: An Indonesian fishball soup. Ingredients: fish paste, tapioca, broth, and shrimp. Instructions: Form fishballs, simmer in broth with garnishes.

food_items.name: Vatrushka
food_items.recipe: A Russian cheese pastry. Ingredients: dough, cottage cheese, eggs, and sugar. Instructions: Fill dough with cheese mixture and bake at 375°F (190°C) for 20–25 minutes.

food_items.name: Yin Yang fish
food_items.recipe: A Chinese dish. Ingredients: fish, spices, and oil. Instructions: Fry fish partially, keeping head alive, and serve with sauce.

food_items.name: Boston cream doughnut
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 2 cups flour
- 1/4 cup sugar
- 1 tbsp yeast
- 1/2 cup milk
- 2 eggs
- Oil for frying
- 1 cup custard
- 1/2 cup chocolate ganache

Instructions:
1. Mix flour, sugar, yeast, milk, and eggs to form dough. Let rise for 1 hour.
2. Shape into doughnuts, let rise again, and fry at 350°F (175°C) for 2–3 minutes per side.
3. Fill with custard and top with ganache.

Serving Suggestion: Serve fresh.

Note: Calorie count is per doughnut.

food_items.name: Ramen
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 8 oz ramen noodles
- 4 cups chicken or pork broth
- 1/2 lb pork, sliced
- 1 egg, boiled
- 1 sheet nori
- 2 tbsp soy sauce
- 1 tbsp miso paste
- Scallions and sesame oil

Instructions:
1. Cook noodles and drain.
2. Simmer broth with soy sauce and miso.
3. Add pork and cook until done.
4. Place noodles in bowls, pour broth over, and top with egg, nori, and scallions.

Serving Suggestion: Serve hot.

Note: Calorie count is per bowl.

food_items.name: Home fries
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 3 medium russet potatoes, peeled and diced
- 1 small onion, finely chopped
- 2 tbsp vegetable oil or butter
- 1/2 tsp paprika
- 1/2 tsp garlic powder
- Salt and pepper to taste
- Optional: chopped parsley for garnish

Instructions:
1. Boil diced potatoes in salted water for 5–7 minutes until slightly tender. Drain and let cool.
2. Heat oil or butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
3. Add onions and sauté for 2–3 minutes until translucent.
4. Add potatoes, paprika, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
5. Cook, stirring occasionally, until potatoes are golden brown and crispy, about 10–15 minutes.
6. Garnish with chopped parsley if desired.
7. Serve hot as a breakfast or side dish.

Note: Calorie count is approximate per 1-cup serving.

food_items.name: Mustacciuoli
food_items.recipe: An Italian spiced cookie. Ingredients: flour, honey, cocoa, and spices. Instructions: Mix dough, shape into diamonds, bake at 350°F (175°C), and coat with chocolate.

food_items.name: Clam cake
food_items.recipe: A New England fritter. Ingredients: clams, flour, eggs, and cornmeal. Instructions: Mix batter, add clams, and fry until golden.

food_items.name: Sarma
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 1 head cabbage
- 1 lb ground beef or pork
- 1/2 cup rice
- 1 onion, chopped
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 tsp paprika
- 1 cup tomato sauce
- Salt and pepper

Instructions:
1. Blanch cabbage leaves to soften.
2. Mix meat, rice, onion, garlic, paprika, salt, and pepper.
3. Place filling in leaves and roll tightly.
4. Layer in a pot, cover with tomato sauce, and simmer for 1–2 hours.

Serving Suggestion: Serve with sour cream.

Note: Calorie count is per 2 rolls.

food_items.name: Shahe fen
food_items.recipe: A Chinese rice noodle. Ingredients: rice flour and water. Instructions: Make noodle dough, steam into sheets, and cut into strips. Stir-fry or use in soups.

food_items.name: Charleston red rice
food_items.recipe: A Southern rice dish. Ingredients: rice, tomatoes, sausage, and bell peppers. Instructions: Cook rice with ingredients until flavorful.

food_items.name: Fish head curry
food_items.recipe: A Singaporean dish. Ingredients: fish head, curry paste, coconut milk, and vegetables. Instructions: Simmer fish in curry sauce for 20–30 minutes.

food_items.name: Podvarak
food_items.recipe: A Serbian cabbage dish. Ingredients: sauerkraut, pork, onions, and paprika. Instructions: Layer ingredients and bake at 350°F (175°C) for 1–2 hours.

food_items.name: Pihtije
food_items.recipe: A Serbian pork aspic. Ingredients: pork, gelatin, garlic, and broth. Instructions: Simmer pork, add gelatin to broth, and chill in molds.

food_items.name: Popara
food_items.recipe: A Balkan bread porridge. Ingredients: stale bread, milk, cheese, and butter. Instructions: Soak bread in milk, add cheese, and heat until creamy.

food_items.name: Kačamak
food_items.recipe: A Balkan cornmeal dish. Ingredients: cornmeal, water, and cheese. Instructions: Cook cornmeal in water, stir in cheese, and serve with yogurt.

food_items.name: Seolleongtang
food_items.recipe: A Korean beef soup. Ingredients: beef bones, brisket, and scallions. Instructions: Simmer bones for 8–10 hours, add meat, and season.

food_items.name: Gołąbki
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 1 head cabbage
- 1 lb ground pork
- 1/2 cup rice
- 1 onion, chopped
- 1 egg
- 1 cup tomato sauce
- Salt and pepper

Instructions:
1. Blanch cabbage leaves.
2. Mix pork, rice, onion, egg, salt, and pepper.
3. Wrap filling in leaves.
4. Place in a pot, cover with tomato sauce, and simmer for 1–2 hours.

Serving Suggestion: Serve with mashed potatoes.

Note: Calorie count is per 2 rolls.

food_items.name: Szaloncukor
food_items.recipe: A Hungarian Christmas candy. Ingredients: fondant, chocolate, and nuts. Instructions: Shape fondant, coat with chocolate, and wrap in foil.

food_items.name: Kalduny
food_items.recipe: A Belarusian dumpling. Ingredients: dough, meat or mushrooms, and onions. Instructions: Fill dough, boil, and serve with butter or broth.

food_items.name: Zrazy
food_items.recipe: A Polish stuffed meat. Ingredients: beef, mushrooms, onions, and breadcrumbs. Instructions: Pound beef, fill, roll, and braise for 1–2 hours.

food_items.name: Panettone
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 4 cups flour
- 1/2 cup sugar
- 1 tbsp yeast
- 1/2 cup milk
- 4 eggs
- 1/2 cup butter
- 1 cup candied fruit
- 1/2 cup raisins

Instructions:
1. Mix flour, sugar, yeast, milk, and eggs to form dough.
2. Knead in butter, fruit, and raisins.
3. Let rise for 2 hours, shape, and rise again.
4. Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 40–50 minutes.

Serving Suggestion: Serve sliced with coffee.

Note: Calorie count is per slice.

food_items.name: Ambelopoulia
food_items.recipe: A Cypriot bird dish. Ingredients: small birds, oil, and spices. Instructions: Grill or fry birds and serve with lemon.

food_items.name: Persimmon pudding
food_items.recipe: An American dessert. Ingredients: persimmon pulp, flour, sugar, and eggs. Instructions: Mix ingredients and bake at 350°F (175°C) for 1 hour.

food_items.name: Floating island
food_items.recipe: A French dessert. Ingredients: egg whites, custard, and caramel. Instructions: Poach meringues, serve on custard, and drizzle with caramel.

food_items.name: Zeeuwse bolus
food_items.recipe: A Dutch sweet roll. Ingredients: dough, brown sugar, and cinnamon. Instructions: Roll dough with sugar mixture, shape, and bake at 375°F (190°C).

food_items.name: Ambuyat
food_items.recipe: A Bruneian sago dish. Ingredients: sago starch and water. Instructions: Mix starch with boiling water, stir until sticky, and serve with curry.

food_items.name: Smulpaj
food_items.recipe: A Swedish crumble. Ingredients: fruit, flour, sugar, and butter. Instructions: Layer fruit, top with crumble, and bake at 375°F (190°C) for 30 minutes.

food_items.name: Moravian spice cookies
food_items.recipe: An American thin cookie. Ingredients: flour, molasses, ginger, cinnamon, cloves, and butter. Instructions: Mix dough, roll thin, cut shapes, and bake at 350°F (175°C) for 8–10 minutes.

food_items.name: Mee pok
food_items.recipe: A Chinese noodle dish. Ingredients: flat egg noodles, pork, fish balls, chili sauce, and soy sauce. Instructions: Cook noodles, toss with sauce, top with pork and fish balls, and garnish with scallions.

food_items.name: Jjigae
food_items.recipe: A Korean stew. Ingredients: tofu, pork, kimchi, gochujang, and vegetables. Instructions: Simmer ingredients in a pot for 20–30 minutes. Serve with rice.

food_items.name: Pizza bagel
food_items.recipe: An American snack. Ingredients: bagel, tomato sauce, mozzarella, and pepperoni. Instructions: Spread sauce on bagel halves, add cheese and toppings, bake at 400°F (200°C) for 10–12 minutes.

food_items.name: Tteok
food_items.recipe: Korean rice cakes. Ingredients: rice flour, water, and sugar. Instructions: Steam rice flour mixture, shape into cylinders or slices, and serve with sweet or savory toppings.

food_items.name: Brændende kærlighed
food_items.recipe: A Danish dish. Ingredients: mashed potatoes, bacon, onions, and butter. Instructions: Fry bacon and onions, serve over mashed potatoes, and drizzle with butter.

food_items.name: Beaten biscuit
food_items.recipe: An American biscuit. Ingredients: flour, lard, salt, and water. Instructions: Beat dough until blistered, roll out, cut into rounds, and bake at 375°F (190°C) for 20–25 minutes.

food_items.name: Æbleflæsk
food_items.recipe: A Danish dish. Ingredients: apples, bacon, sugar, and onions. Instructions: Fry bacon, sauté apples and onions with sugar, and serve together.

food_items.name: Chicken paprikash
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 1 lb chicken thighs
- 1 onion, chopped
- 2 tbsp paprika
- 1 cup sour cream
- 2 tbsp flour
- 2 tbsp butter
- Salt and pepper

Instructions:
1. Sauté onion in butter until soft.
2. Add chicken and paprika, cook until browned.
3. Add water, simmer for 30 minutes.
4. Mix sour cream and flour, stir into sauce, and cook until thickened.

Serving Suggestion: Serve with egg noodles.

Note: Calorie count is per serving (1 cup).

food_items.name: Tangyuan
food_items.recipe: Chinese glutinous rice balls. Ingredients: glutinous rice flour, water, and black sesame or red bean filling. Instructions: Form dough, wrap filling, boil until floating, and serve in sweet broth.

food_items.name: Tuna pot
food_items.recipe: A Japanese dish. Ingredients: tuna, potatoes, carrots, and soy sauce. Instructions: Simmer ingredients in a pot with soy sauce and broth for 20–30 minutes.

food_items.name: Burnt ends
food_items.recipe: An American barbecue dish. Ingredients: brisket, barbecue sauce, and spices. Instructions: Smoke brisket, cube ends, coat with sauce, and grill until caramelized.

food_items.name: Jamón ibérico
food_items.recipe: Spanish cured ham. Ingredients: Iberian pork leg, salt. Instructions: Cure ham for 12–48 months. Slice thinly and serve.

food_items.name: Rakfisk
food_items.recipe: A Norwegian fermented fish dish. Ingredients: trout, salt. Instructions: Ferment fish for 2–12 months, slice, and serve with flatbread and sour cream.

food_items.name: Zarangollo
food_items.recipe: A Spanish dish. Ingredients: zucchini, onions, eggs, and olive oil. Instructions: Sauté zucchini and onions, add beaten eggs, and cook until set.

food_items.name: Túró Rudi
food_items.recipe: A Hungarian dessert. Ingredients: curd cheese, sugar, chocolate coating. Instructions: Mix curd with sugar, shape into bars, and coat with chocolate.

food_items.name: Flummery
food_items.recipe: A British dessert. Ingredients: oats, cream, sugar, and fruit juice. Instructions: Soak oats, cook with cream and sugar, add juice, and chill.

food_items.name: Cecina
food_items.recipe: A Spanish cured meat. Ingredients: beef or horse meat, salt. Instructions: Cure meat for 7–12 months, slice thinly, and serve.

food_items.name: Galinha à portuguesa
food_items.recipe: A Macanese dish. Ingredients: chicken, potatoes, soy sauce, and curry. Instructions: Marinate chicken, simmer with potatoes and curry, and serve with rice.

food_items.name: Ankimo
food_items.recipe: A Japanese dish. Ingredients: monkfish liver, salt, and sake. Instructions: Steam liver, marinate in sake, and serve sliced with soy sauce.

food_items.name: Galinha à africana
food_items.recipe: A Macanese dish. Ingredients: chicken, peanuts, coconut milk, and chili. Instructions: Marinate chicken, grill, and serve with peanut-coconut sauce.

food_items.name: Cha siu bao
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 2 cups flour
- 1/2 lb char siu pork
- 1/2 cup water
- 1 tbsp sugar
- 1 tsp yeast
- 2 tbsp hoisin sauce

Instructions:
1. Mix flour, water, sugar, and yeast to form dough. Let rise for 1 hour.
2. Chop pork, mix with hoisin sauce.
3. Divide dough, fill with pork, and seal.
4. Steam buns for 15 minutes.

Serving Suggestion: Serve hot.

Note: Calorie count is per bun.

food_items.name: Fugu chiri
food_items.recipe: A Japanese pufferfish stew. Ingredients: fugu, vegetables, tofu, and dashi. Instructions: Simmer ingredients in dashi broth for 10–15 minutes. Serve with ponzu.

food_items.name: Assidat Zgougou
food_items.recipe: A Tunisian dessert. Ingredients: pine nuts, flour, sugar, and cream. Instructions: Blend pine nuts, cook with flour and sugar, top with cream, and chill.

food_items.name: Oxtail stew
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 2 lbs oxtail
- 1 onion, chopped
- 2 carrots, sliced
- 2 tbsp tomato paste
- 2 cups beef broth
- 1 tsp thyme
- Oil

Instructions:
1. Brown oxtail in oil.
2. Sauté onion, carrots, and tomato paste.
3. Add broth and thyme, simmer for 3–4 hours until tender.

Serving Suggestion: Serve with rice.

Note: Calorie count is per 1 cup serving.

food_items.name: Laping
food_items.recipe: A Tibetan dish. Ingredients: mung bean starch, water, chili oil, and soy sauce. Instructions: Cook starch into noodles, chill, and toss with chili oil and soy sauce.

food_items.name: Chaku
food_items.recipe: A Nepali sweet. Ingredients: jaggery, ghee, and nuts. Instructions: Melt jaggery with ghee, add nuts, pour into molds, and cool.

food_items.name: Caldillo de perro
food_items.recipe: A Spanish fish soup. Ingredients: fish, tomatoes, onions, and chili. Instructions: Simmer ingredients in broth for 20–30 minutes. Serve with bread.

food_items.name: Sopa de Gato
food_items.recipe: A Spanish soup. Ingredients: bread, garlic, paprika, and eggs. Instructions: Fry bread with garlic, add paprika and water, simmer, and poach eggs in soup.

food_items.name: Keledoş
food_items.recipe: A Turkish dish. Ingredients: lamb, yogurt, chickpeas, and wheat. Instructions: Cook lamb and chickpeas, mix with yogurt and wheat, and serve warm.

food_items.name: Mücver
food_items.recipe: Turkish zucchini fritters. Ingredients: zucchini, eggs, flour, and dill. Instructions: Grate zucchini, mix with ingredients, fry in patties, and serve with yogurt.

food_items.name: Brotzeit
food_items.recipe: A German snack. Ingredients: bread, sausage, cheese, pickles, and mustard. Instructions: Arrange ingredients on a board and serve.

food_items.name: Shekerbura
food_items.recipe: An Azerbaijani pastry. Ingredients: flour, butter, sugar, and nuts. Instructions: Make dough, fill with nut mixture, shape, and bake at 350°F (175°C) for 15–20 minutes.

food_items.name: Oeufs en meurette
food_items.recipe: A French dish. Ingredients: eggs, red wine, bacon, and onions. Instructions: Poach eggs in red wine sauce with bacon and onions. Serve with toast.

food_items.name: Pappa al pomodoro
food_items.recipe: An Italian soup. Ingredients: tomatoes, bread, basil, and olive oil. Instructions: Simmer tomatoes, add bread and basil, cook until thick, and drizzle with oil.

food_items.name: Teurgoule
food_items.recipe: A French rice pudding. Ingredients: rice, milk, sugar, and cinnamon. Instructions: Bake ingredients at 300°F (150°C) for 4–5 hours until creamy.

food_items.name: Bánh xèo
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 1 cup rice flour
- 1/2 cup coconut milk
- 1 cup water
- 1/2 lb shrimp
- 1/2 lb pork, sliced
- 1 cup bean sprouts
- 1 onion, sliced
- Fish sauce for dipping

Instructions:
1. Mix rice flour, coconut milk, and water for batter.
2. Heat oil in a skillet, pour batter, and add shrimp, pork, and onion.
3. Cook until crispy, add bean sprouts, and fold.
4. Serve with fish sauce.

Serving Suggestion: Wrap in lettuce with herbs.

Note: Calorie count is per pancake.

food_items.name: Musakhan
food_items.recipe: A Palestinian dish. Ingredients: chicken, flatbread, sumac, and onions. Instructions: Roast chicken with sumac and onions, serve on flatbread.

food_items.name: Maqluba
food_items.recipe: A Levantine rice dish. Ingredients: rice, chicken, eggplant, and spices. Instructions: Layer ingredients, cook, and invert to serve.

food_items.name: Bob chorba
food_items.recipe: A Bulgarian bean soup. Ingredients: beans, onions, tomatoes, and mint. Instructions: Simmer ingredients for 2–3 hours. Serve with bread.

food_items.name: Rum baba
food_items.recipe: A European cake. Ingredients: yeast dough, rum, and syrup. Instructions: Bake dough, soak in rum syrup, and serve with cream.

food_items.name: Veda bread
food_items.recipe: An Irish bread. Ingredients: flour, buttermilk, sugar, and malt. Instructions: Mix ingredients, bake at 375°F (190°C) for 40–50 minutes.

food_items.name: Fried shrimp
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 1 lb shrimp, peeled
- 1 cup flour
- 2 eggs
- 1 cup breadcrumbs
- Oil for frying

Instructions:
1. Coat shrimp in flour, dip in eggs, and cover with breadcrumbs.
2. Fry at 350°F (175°C) until golden.

Serving Suggestion: Serve with cocktail sauce.

Note: Calorie count is per 1/2 lb serving.

food_items.name: Pastilla
food_items.recipe: A Moroccan pie. Ingredients: phyllo, pigeon or chicken, almonds, eggs, and cinnamon. Instructions: Layer filling in phyllo, bake at 375°F (190°C) for 30–40 minutes, and dust with sugar.

food_items.name: Strawberry delight
food_items.recipe: An American dessert. Ingredients: strawberries, cream cheese, whipped cream, and graham crackers. Instructions: Layer ingredients, chill, and serve.

food_items.name: Cheese dream
food_items.recipe: An American sandwich. Ingredients: bread, cheese, butter, and bacon. Instructions: Butter bread, add cheese and bacon, grill until melted.

food_items.name: Frejon
food_items.recipe: A Nigerian dish. Ingredients: beans, coconut milk, and sugar. Instructions: Cook beans, blend with coconut milk, sweeten, and serve with fish.

food_items.name: Gyeran-jjim
food_items.recipe: A Korean egg dish. Ingredients: eggs, scallions, and broth. Instructions: Whisk eggs with broth, steam until set, and garnish with scallions.

food_items.name: Revithia
food_items.recipe: A Greek chickpea stew. Ingredients: chickpeas, onions, olive oil, and lemon. Instructions: Simmer chickpeas with ingredients for 2–3 hours.

food_items.name: Nasi bogana
food_items.recipe: An Indonesian rice dish. Ingredients: rice, chicken, tempeh, and coconut milk. Instructions: Cook rice in coconut milk, serve with fried chicken and tempeh.

food_items.name: Torta de gazpacho
food_items.recipe: A Spanish flatbread. Ingredients: flour, olive oil, tomatoes, and peppers. Instructions: Make dough, top with vegetables, and bake at 400°F (200°C) for 20–25 minutes.

food_items.name: Double Down
food_items.recipe: An American fast food item. Ingredients: fried chicken, bacon, cheese, and sauce. Instructions: Use chicken as buns, layer bacon, cheese, and sauce, and serve.

food_items.name: Seri Muka
food_items.recipe: A Malaysian dessert. Ingredients: glutinous rice, coconut milk, and pandan custard. Instructions: Steam rice, top with custard, and steam again.

food_items.name: Obi non
food_items.recipe: An Uzbek flatbread. Ingredients: flour, yeast, water, and sesame seeds. Instructions: Make dough, shape, sprinkle with seeds, and bake at 450°F (230°C) for 15–20 minutes.

food_items.name: Garganelli
food_items.recipe: An Italian pasta. Ingredients: flour, eggs, and water. Instructions: Make dough, roll into squares, shape into tubes, and cook in boiling water for 3–5 minutes.

food_items.name: Kig ha farz
food_items.recipe: A French stew. Ingredients: pork, vegetables, buckwheat dumpling, and broth. Instructions: Simmer pork and vegetables, add dumpling, and cook for 2–3 hours.

food_items.name: Mississippi mud pie
food_items.recipe: An American dessert. Ingredients: chocolate, butter, eggs, and whipped cream. Instructions: Bake chocolate crust, fill with pudding, top with cream, and chill.

food_items.name: Eve's pudding
food_items.recipe: A British dessert. Ingredients: apples, sponge cake batter, and sugar. Instructions: Layer apples in a dish, top with batter, and bake at 350°F (175°C) for 40–50 minutes.

food_items.name: Amala
food_items.recipe: A Nigerian dish. Ingredients: yam flour, water. Instructions: Boil water, stir in yam flour, cook until thick, and serve with stew.

food_items.name: Okinawa soba
food_items.recipe: A Japanese noodle dish. Ingredients: wheat noodles, pork, bonito broth, and scallions. Instructions: Cook noodles, serve in broth with pork and scallions.

food_items.name: Lamian
food_items.recipe: Chinese hand-pulled noodles. Ingredients: flour, water, and beef broth. Instructions: Pull dough into noodles, cook in boiling water, and serve in broth.

food_items.name: Soki
food_items.recipe: An Okinawan dish. Ingredients: pork ribs, soy sauce, and awamori. Instructions: Simmer ribs with soy sauce and awamori for 2–3 hours.

food_items.name: Chicken Maryland
food_items.recipe: An American dish. Ingredients: chicken, corn fritters, and gravy. Instructions: Fry chicken, serve with fritters and gravy.

food_items.name: Chanpurū
food_items.recipe: An Okinawan stir-fry. Ingredients: tofu, pork, vegetables, and eggs. Instructions: Stir-fry ingredients and serve hot.

food_items.name: Mlinci
food_items.recipe: A Croatian pasta. Ingredients: flour, water, and eggs. Instructions: Make thin dough, bake until crisp, break into pieces, and serve with sauce.

food_items.name: Smyrna meatballs
food_items.recipe: A Greek dish. Ingredients: ground beef, bread, eggs, and tomato sauce. Instructions: Mix ingredients, form meatballs, bake, and serve with sauce.

food_items.name: Tavern sandwich
food_items.recipe: An American sandwich. Ingredients: ground beef, onions, and bun. Instructions: Cook beef with onions, serve on a bun with pickles.

food_items.name: Yangzhou fried rice
food_items.recipe: A Chinese dish. Ingredients: rice, shrimp, ham, and vegetables. Instructions: Stir-fry ingredients with rice and serve.

food_items.name: Qutab
food_items.recipe: An Azerbaijani flatbread. Ingredients: dough, meat or greens, and yogurt. Instructions: Fill dough, fold, cook on a griddle, and serve with yogurt.

food_items.name: Dum Aloo
food_items.recipe: An Indian dish. Ingredients: potatoes, yogurt, and spices. Instructions: Cook potatoes in spiced yogurt sauce and serve with rice.

food_items.name: Queijo do Pico
food_items.recipe: A Portuguese cheese. Ingredients: cow’s milk, rennet. Instructions: Curdle milk, age for 20–30 days, and serve.

food_items.name: Cocada
food_items.recipe: A Latin American sweet. Ingredients: coconut, sugar, and milk. Instructions: Cook ingredients until thick, shape, and cool.

food_items.name: Calf's liver and bacon
food_items.recipe: A British dish. Ingredients: calf’s liver, bacon, onions, and flour. Instructions: Fry bacon and onions, coat liver in flour, fry, and serve.

food_items.name: Moules-frites
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 2 lbs mussels
- 2 lbs potatoes, cut into fries
- 1 onion, chopped
- 1 cup white wine
- 2 tbsp butter

Instructions:
1. Fry potatoes until crispy.
2. Sauté onion in butter, add mussels and wine, cook until mussels open.
3. Serve mussels with fries.

Serving Suggestion: Serve with mayonnaise.

Note: Calorie count is per serving.

food_items.name: Anarsa
food_items.recipe: An Indian sweet. Ingredients: rice flour, jaggery, and poppy seeds. Instructions: Make dough, shape into discs, coat with poppy seeds, and fry.

food_items.name: Tlayuda
food_items.recipe: A Mexican dish. Ingredients: large tortilla, beans, cheese, and meat. Instructions: Toast tortilla, spread with beans, add toppings, and serve.

food_items.name: Šakotis
food_items.recipe: A Lithuanian cake. Ingredients: eggs, flour, butter, and sugar. Instructions: Pour batter over a rotating spit, bake until golden, and slice.

food_items.name: Jollof rice
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 2 cups rice
- 1 lb chicken
- 2 tomatoes, pureed
- 1 onion, chopped
- 2 tbsp tomato paste
- 1 tsp thyme
- Oil

Instructions:
1. Fry chicken, set aside.
2. Sauté onion, add tomato puree and paste, cook until thick.
3. Add rice, thyme, and water, simmer until rice is cooked.
4. Serve with chicken.

Serving Suggestion: Serve with plantains.

Note: Calorie count is per 1 cup serving.

food_items.name: Moin moin
food_items.recipe: A Nigerian steamed bean pudding. Ingredients: black-eyed peas, onions, peppers, and oil. Instructions: Blend ingredients, pour into molds, and steam for 45 minutes.

food_items.name: Jam roly-poly
food_items.recipe: A British dessert. Ingredients: suet dough, jam, and sugar. Instructions: Spread jam on dough, roll, steam for 1–2 hours, and serve with custard.

food_items.name: Hochzeitssuppe
food_items.recipe: A German soup. Ingredients: beef broth, meatballs, noodles, and vegetables. Instructions: Simmer broth with ingredients and serve.

food_items.name: Mucenici
food_items.recipe: A Romanian dessert. Ingredients: dough, walnuts, and honey. Instructions: Shape dough into figure-eights, bake, and coat with honey and walnuts.

food_items.name: Ema datshi
food_items.recipe: A Bhutanese stew. Ingredients: chilies, cheese, and onions. Instructions: Simmer chilies and onions, add cheese, and serve with rice.

food_items.name: Ngo hiang
food_items.recipe: A Chinese dish. Ingredients: pork, shrimp, and tofu skin. Instructions: Wrap filling in tofu skin, fry, and serve with chili sauce.

food_items.name: Jello salad
food_items.recipe: An American dish. Ingredients: gelatin, fruit, and whipped cream. Instructions: Mix gelatin with fruit, chill until set, and top with whipped cream.

food_items.name: Claypot chicken rice
food_items.recipe: A Chinese dish. Ingredients: rice, chicken, soy sauce, and mushrooms. Instructions: Cook ingredients in a claypot until rice is tender.

food_items.name: Maeun-tang
food_items.recipe: A Korean fish stew. Ingredients: fish, vegetables, and gochujang. Instructions: Simmer ingredients in broth for 20–30 minutes.

food_items.name: Cifantuan
food_items.recipe: A Chinese dish. Ingredients: glutinous rice, youtiao, and pork floss. Instructions: Wrap youtiao and pork floss in rice and shape into balls.

food_items.name: Rhubarb pie
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 1 pie crust
- 4 cups rhubarb, chopped
- 1 cup sugar
- 2 tbsp flour
- 1 egg

Instructions:
1. Mix rhubarb, sugar, flour, and egg.
2. Pour into crust, cover with top crust.
3. Bake at 375°F (190°C) for 45–50 minutes.

Serving Suggestion: Serve with whipped cream.

Note: Calorie count is per slice.

food_items.name: Olla podrida
food_items.recipe: A Spanish stew. Ingredients: pork, beans, vegetables, and sausage. Instructions: Simmer ingredients for 2–3 hours.

food_items.name: Har gow
food_items.recipe: A Chinese dumpling. Ingredients: shrimp, bamboo shoots, and wheat starch wrapper. Instructions: Fill wrappers, steam for 6–8 minutes, and serve.

food_items.name: Sayur lodeh
food_items.recipe: An Indonesian vegetable stew. Ingredients: coconut milk, vegetables, and turmeric. Instructions: Simmer vegetables in coconut milk with spices.

food_items.name: Memela
food_items.recipe: A Mexican dish. Ingredients: masa, beans, and cheese. Instructions: Shape masa into ovals, cook on a griddle, and top with beans and cheese.

food_items.name: Wenchang chicken
food_items.recipe: A Chinese dish. Ingredients: chicken, ginger, and garlic. Instructions: Poach chicken, serve with ginger-garlic sauce.

food_items.name: Galinhada
food_items.recipe: A Brazilian dish. Ingredients: chicken, rice, and turmeric. Instructions: Cook chicken with rice and spices until tender.

food_items.name: Lecsó
food_items.recipe: A Hungarian stew. Ingredients: peppers, tomatoes, and onions. Instructions: Sauté ingredients until soft and serve.

food_items.name: Gypsy tart
food_items.recipe: A British dessert. Ingredients: evaporated milk, brown sugar, and pastry. Instructions: Mix milk and sugar, pour into pastry, and bake at 350°F (175°C) for 20–25 minutes.

food_items.name: Bougatsa
food_items.recipe: A Greek pastry. Ingredients: phyllo, custard, and sugar. Instructions: Layer phyllo with custard, bake at 375°F (190°C) for 30–40 minutes, and dust with sugar.

food_items.name: Germknödel
food_items.recipe: An Austrian dumpling. Ingredients: yeast dough, plum jam, and butter. Instructions: Fill dough with jam, steam, and serve with butter and poppy seeds.

food_items.name: Haystack
food_items.recipe: An American dessert. Ingredients: chow mein noodles, peanut butter, and chocolate. Instructions: Melt peanut butter and chocolate, mix with noodles, shape, and chill.

food_items.name: Yule log
food_items.recipe: A French dessert. Ingredients: sponge cake, chocolate, and cream. Instructions: Roll cake with cream, coat with chocolate, and decorate.

food_items.name: Butter cookie
food_items.recipe: A Danish cookie. Ingredients: butter, flour, sugar, and vanilla. Instructions: Mix ingredients, shape, and bake at 350°F (175°C) for 10–12 minutes.

food_items.name: Chicken à la King
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 1 lb chicken, cooked
- 1 cup mushrooms
- 1/2 cup cream
- 2 tbsp flour
- 2 tbsp butter
- 1/2 cup bell peppers

Instructions:
1. Sauté mushrooms and peppers in butter.
2. Add flour, then cream, and stir until thick.
3. Add chicken and heat through.

Serving Suggestion: Serve over rice.

Note: Calorie count is per 1 cup serving.

food_items.name: Méchoui
food_items.recipe: A North African dish. Ingredients: whole lamb, spices, and olive oil. Instructions: Roast lamb with spices for 4–5 hours and serve.

food_items.name: Croquette
food_items.recipe: A Spanish dish. Ingredients: mashed potatoes, meat, and breadcrumbs. Instructions: Mix potatoes with meat, shape, coat with breadcrumbs, and fry.

food_items.name: Shami kebab
food_items.recipe: An Indian dish. Ingredients: ground meat, lentils, and spices. Instructions: Cook meat and lentils, shape into patties, and fry.

food_items.name: Chicken and waffles
food_items.recipe: An American dish. Ingredients: fried chicken, waffles, and syrup. Instructions: Fry chicken, make waffles, and serve with syrup.

food_items.name: Poke
food_items.recipe: A Hawaiian dish. Ingredients: raw fish, soy sauce, sesame oil, and seaweed. Instructions: Cube fish, toss with ingredients, and serve.

food_items.name: Punsch-roll
food_items.recipe: A Swedish pastry. Ingredients: marzipan, biscuit, and punsch liqueur. Instructions: Roll biscuit in marzipan, dip in chocolate, and chill.

food_items.name: Turtle soup
food_items.recipe: An American dish. Ingredients: turtle meat, tomatoes, and sherry. Instructions: Simmer meat with ingredients for 2–3 hours.

food_items.name: Kansar
food_items.recipe: An Indian dish. Ingredients: wheat flour, jaggery, and ghee. Instructions: Cook flour with jaggery and ghee, and serve.

food_items.name: Glamorgan sausage
food_items.recipe: A Welsh dish. Ingredients: cheese, breadcrumbs, and leeks. Instructions: Mix ingredients, shape into sausages, and fry.

food_items.name: Mango pudding
food_items.recipe: A Chinese dessert. Ingredients: mango, gelatin, and cream. Instructions: Blend mango, mix with gelatin and cream, chill until set.

food_items.name: Bánh canh
food_items.recipe: A Vietnamese noodle soup. Ingredients: thick noodles, pork, and fish sauce. Instructions: Cook noodles in pork broth, and serve with fish sauce.

food_items.name: Caparrones
food_items.recipe: A Spanish stew. Ingredients: red beans, sausage, and paprika. Instructions: Simmer beans with sausage and spices for 2–3 hours.

food_items.name: Zopf
food_items.recipe: A Swiss bread. Ingredients: flour, milk, eggs, and butter. Instructions: Braid dough, bake at 375°F (190°C) for 30–40 minutes.

food_items.name: Bath bun
food_items.recipe: A British bun. Ingredients: flour, sugar, and dried fruit. Instructions: Mix dough with fruit, bake at 350°F (175°C) for 15–20 minutes.

food_items.name: Chelsea bun
food_items.recipe: A British bun. Ingredients: dough, currants, and cinnamon. Instructions: Roll dough with currants and cinnamon, slice, and bake at 375°F (190°C) for 20–25 minutes.

food_items.name: London bun
food_items.recipe: A British bun. Ingredients: dough, sugar, and icing. Instructions: Bake dough, top with icing, and serve.

food_items.name: Saffron bun
food_items.recipe: A British bun. Ingredients: dough, saffron, and currants. Instructions: Mix dough with saffron and currants, bake at 350°F (175°C) for 15–20 minutes.

food_items.name: Chakhchoukha
food_items.recipe: An Algerian dish. Ingredients: flatbread, lamb, and tomato sauce. Instructions: Cook lamb in sauce, serve over torn flatbread.

food_items.name: Angel food cake
food_items.recipe: An American cake. Ingredients: egg whites, flour, and sugar. Instructions: Whip egg whites, fold in flour and sugar, bake at 350°F (175°C) for 35–40 minutes.

food_items.name: Lalab
food_items.recipe: An Indonesian salad. Ingredients: raw vegetables, chili, and shrimp paste. Instructions: Toss vegetables with chili and shrimp paste dressing.

food_items.name: Suckling pig
food_items.recipe: A Spanish dish. Ingredients: young pig, garlic, and herbs. Instructions: Roast pig with seasonings for 3–4 hours.

food_items.name: Barmbrack
food_items.recipe: An Irish bread. Ingredients: flour, dried fruit, and tea. Instructions: Soak fruit in tea, mix with dough, bake at 350°F (175°C) for 50–60 minutes.

food_items.name: Kotlet schabowy
food_items.recipe: A Polish dish. Ingredients: pork cutlet, breadcrumbs, and eggs. Instructions: Coat pork in breadcrumbs, fry, and serve with potatoes.

food_items.name: Pastel de nata
food_items.recipe: A Portuguese tart. Ingredients: puff pastry, custard, and cinnamon. Instructions: Fill pastry with custard, bake at 400°F (200°C) for 15–20 minutes.

food_items.name: Shave ice
food_items.recipe: A Hawaiian dessert. Ingredients: shaved ice, syrup, and condensed milk. Instructions: Shave ice, top with syrup and milk, and serve.

food_items.name: Tipsy cake

food_items.name: Hamburger
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 1/2 lb (225g) ground beef (approx. 375 calories)
- 1 hamburger bun (approx. 120 calories)
- 1 slice cheddar cheese (approx. 70 calories)
- Lettuce, tomato, onion (approx. 10 calories)
- 1 tbsp ketchup (15 calories), 1 tsp mustard (5 calories)

Instructions:
1. Shape the ground beef into a patty and season with salt and pepper.
2. Grill or pan-fry the beef patty over medium-high heat for 3–5 minutes per side, until cooked to your desired doneness.
3. Toast the hamburger bun lightly.
4. Place the patty on the bottom bun, add the slice of cheese on top while still hot so it melts slightly.
5. Add lettuce, sliced tomato, and onion.
6. Spread ketchup and mustard on the top bun, then close the burger.
7. Serve immediately.

Serving Suggestion: Best served hot with a side of fries.

Note: Calorie count is approximate and per burger.

food_items.name: Pasta salad
food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:
- 2 cups cooked pasta (e.g., rotini or penne)
- 1/2 cup cherry tomatoes, halved
- 1/4 cup cucumber, diced
- 1/4 cup red onion, finely chopped
- 1/4 cup black olives, sliced
- 1/4 cup shredded cheddar cheese (optional)
- 1/4 cup Italian dressing (store-bought or homemade)
- Salt and pepper to taste

Instructions:
1. Cook pasta according to package instructions. Drain and let cool.
2. In a large bowl, combine cooked pasta, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, black olives, and cheese.
3. Pour in Italian dressing and toss to coat evenly.
4. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
5. Cover and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes before serving.
6. Serve chilled as a side dish or light meal.

Note: Calorie count is approximate per serving (1 cup).

- 1 cup broth

- Corn husks

Instructions:
1. Mix masa, broth, and lard.
2. Spread masa on husks, add pork and sauce.
3. Wrap, steam for 1–2 hours.

Serving Suggestion: Serve with salsa.

Note: Calorie count is per tamale.

food_items.recipe:
Ingredients:

- 1/2 cup lime juice
- 1 red onion, thinly sliced
- 1 tomato, diced

3. Season with salt and serve chilled.
